DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; GREECE ; NO . 2 TURKISH ENVOY IN ATHENS IS SLAIN
DOC.TEXT: Gunmen from the notorious November 17 terrorist gang killed Turkey ' s second-ranking diplomat in Athens as he drove to work.Greek and Turkish leaders condemned the attack and expressed hope that it would not damage relations between their countries , which are regional rivals . Authorities said three men in a car pulled alongside Deputy Chief of Mission Haluk Sipahioglu ' s car on a road in suburban Athens and opened_fire . Sipahioglu , 46 , was taken_to a hospital but died in surgery .
